title: Executive Order 6364-Authorization to Appoint Mrs. Jean Springstead Whittemore
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the provisions of the last sentence of the eighth paragraph of subdivision second of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (ch. 27, 22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that Mrs. Jean Springstead Whittemore may be appointed to the position of collector of customs for Puerto Rico without compliance with the requirements of the civil-service rules.
This order is recommended by the Secretary of the Treasury.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6364-Authorization to Appoint Mrs. Jean Springstead Whittemore Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362188
